title: r/AmITheA**hole For Mocking My Trans "Daughter?"
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's video, OP has a trans child who is trying to establish a new identity for herself. OP's ex-wife, however, refuses to accept her child's transition and keeps referring to her as "he/him." Things eventually boil over when OP's ex-wife tricks her daughter and cuts her long hair really short to be closer to a boy's haircut.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
